title: Quinn
body: Last game I played Quinn and every time I used my Q it doesn`t worked...they could hit me always.

replies.body: the worst quinn rework i have ever seen this champion should never be reworked because after the rework is the most uselles adc and top laner and at all roles worst champion and cant teamfight and cant 1vs1
quinn rework the worst rework i have ever seen in my life
They changed the Q some patches ago. It doesn't blind anymore. It's just like Grave's Smokebomb.
